device_mount: Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
evaluation: Technical performance (speed); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: Investigates the use of gaze and manual input for positioning gaze-acquired content on personal devices. Evaluates two techniques, (1) Gaze Positioning + Touch confirmation, (2) Gaze selection + Manual Positioning. Compares direct touch with indirect mouse.
tracking_characteristic: Direction; Multiple screens; Location 2D; Outside-in tracking
device_models: SMI iView X HED eye tracker
